page.title: 08HOME LIFE
page.content: Most people in the village have pets, either cats or dogs.Dogs take an important part in farm life. Most people have electricity because you can't get gas in the village unless you have calor gas.When the men go to work the women tidy up the house. Most of the mums have jobs at home, or have to look after the children, if the children are not old enough to go to the village school. Most people go to larger shops for their household shopping in Ledbury, only two miles away from Eastnor, because the local shop recently closed down.Many of the houses are rented therefore are not particulary modern although some of the households now have all the modern conveniences like videos,dishwashers,computers etc..
